class_notes: This section is for MN semester 2 students only.
course_description: Students will apply prior knowledge and use critical thinking skills to compare similarities and differences between commonly occurring illnesses that manifest as acute, life threatening conditions, or over time, transition into chronic, debilitating or life-limiting illnesses.
schedule_location: MF 8am-10:20am in Nursing Learning Ctr, Rm 225
sections: Class Nbr: 2467, Section #: 200, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MF 8-10:20a, Instructor: P. Landerfelt, Status: Open
